Kustomer is a customer relationship management software system. Competes directly with CRM. Some of their customers are Amazon's Ring.

@WeenyBaby @eloquentpanda I do think long term ... I literally just said I sold big tech after 4 years ... Lol

My trading strategy:
- Quintuple check they don't suck balls operationally
- Purchase and set a target that isn't battered
- Decide to ride it out or take the profits at target, repeating up the chain
- Repeat for up to 5 years
